Articles.Content:
Been playing the demo for a while, and I loved it so much I bought the full version with some X-mas money. I'll be posting in the Mission forum soon, as soon as I get the images I took ready. Look for that, 'tis my first ship.

I got the hang of the physics with the demo, learned how to orbit there. I'm loving the game so far! Ever since Orbiter I was dreaming of this...
Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear that you've been enjoying the game. I'll keep my eyes peeled for that mission report.
